attributes.action: Abolish charges for non direct debit payment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abolish charges for non direct debit payment, for those who wish to pay by other means. Companies such as Virgin and BT are charging customers as much as £5 for not paying by direct debit, these charges are unfair and extortionate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
